home.description:
Hi Emily!  Here's my attempt to convince you that I am semi-competent with this "tech stuff".  I built this site so that we can track and remember things in our relationship!  Heres some initial features:



1. A couple blog posts about our adventures/misadventures.
2. A goals checklist.
3. Day counter
